import React from 'react'; import About from './About'; import Contact from './Contact'; import Services from './Services'; import Footer from './Footer'; const [msg, setMsg] = useState({ name : "", email : "", message : "" }); const handleChange = (event) =>{ let name = event.target.name; let value = event.target.value; setMsg({...msg, [name]:value}); } const handleSubmit = async (event)=>{ event.preventDefault(); const {name, email, message} = msg; try { const res = await fetch('/message', { method : "POST", headers : { "Content-Type" : "application/json" }, body : JSON.stringify({ name, email, message }) }) console.log(res.status) if(res.status === 400 || !res){ window.alert("Message Not Sent. Try Again Later") }else{ window.alert("Message Sent"); setMsg({ name : "", email : "", message : "" }) } } catch (error) { console.log(error); } } const Home = () => { return (

Hello, I'm Moreno.

I'm a freelance developer here to help you design and build the website you need.

About Me

Who Am I
